item.title: Learn this one WEIRD trick for stunning results
item.description: Much of the mental bandwith in my studio lately (when it’s not getting clogged by the force of will required to land the plane of another semester) has been dedicated to thinking through why so much contemporary design looks…kinda the same? I’ll concede that this might simply be a me problem â€” algorithms exist to feed me slop I’ve volunteered to like, and even in the theoretically more open confines of are.

item.title: Get the Jelly Out Your Spine
item.description: I can’t go to sleep, I can’t shut my eyes
